name: Sundarbans
description: Explore the largest mangrove forest in the world, home to the Royal Bengal Tiger.

name: Cox's Bazar
description: Visit the longest natural sea beach in the world, famous for its beautiful sunset.

name: Srimangal
description: Discover the tea capital of Bangladesh, known for its lush green hills and tea gardens.

name: Dhaka
description: Experience the vibrant capital city with its rich history and diverse culture.

name: Bandarban
description: Explore the stunning hill tracts of Bandarban, known for its scenic beauty and tribal culture.

name: Rangamati
description: Enjoy the picturesque landscapes and tribal heritage in the heart of the Chittagong Hill Tracts.
